text: Helmut Bakaitis (born 26 September 1944) is a German-born Australian director, actor and screenwriter. He is known for his role as The Architect in The Matrix movie series. Bakaitis was born in Lauban, Lower Silesia, Germany (now Luba≈Ñ, Poland). Bakaitis started teaching directing at Australian Academy of Dramatic Art (AADA). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:German movie directors Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors Category:German stage actors Category:German screenwriters Category:Australian movie directors Category:Australian screenwriters Category:Australian stage actors Category:Australian television actors Category:Australian movie actors Category:Australian educators Category:German educators Category:Naturalised citizens of Australia
title: Helmut Bakaitis
